# Arena (Building)
## Overview
**Arena**

**Create** 109 Goods, 20 Influence, 96 Labor, 1 Magic (4,800 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Bar (Room)|Bar]], 1 [[Bath (Room)|Bath]], 4 [[Battle Ring (Room)|Battle Rings]], 1 [[Game Room (Room)|Game Room]], 1 [[Infirmary (Room)|Infirmary]], 1 [[Lavatory (Room)|Lavatory]], 1 [[Office (Room)|Office]], 1 [[Storage (Room)|Storage]], 1 [[Storefront (Room)|Storefront]]

A large public structure for competitions, demonstrations, team sports, or bloodsports.
